Here are some unique highlights of the South Asia Satellite that was successfully launched today.
The gift of a communications satellite for use by neighbours at no cost has perhaps no precedent worldwide.
The footprint of the Satellite extends all over South Asia.
The South Asia Satellite has 12 Ku band transponders which India's neighbours can utilise to increase communications.
Each country will get access to at least one transponder through which they could beam their own programming.
The satellite will facilitate DTH television, VSAT links, tele-education, telemedicine and disaster management support.
It will provide critical communication links in times of disasters such as earthquakes, cyclones, floods, and tsunamis.

Athens, today. Half an hour after taking off from Ezeiza on the way to Greece, someone sits next to me: "Hi Cristina. How are you?"...
He is an Argentine businessman who produces cleaning products of a well-known brand that employs 200 workers.
"And how do things go in the company?" I ask. "Wrong. Sales fell by more than 30%, "he replies.
"It's a lot," he adds. We both agree that cleaning supplies, when many are not enough for food ...
... become, unfortunately, almost a luxury item. I ask him if he dismissed any worker ...
He says: "No, no. I'm trying to avoid it. I feel them as part of my family. But I had to suspend the overtime "
"That has had a big impact on your income, add inflation ... The picture is very complicated." ...
We keep talking and he tells me an anecdote about when he met Néstor. What he told is textual ...
"In 2006 the Price Agreements were signed in the Casa Rosada and I went with my accountant." ... he tells me
"You could not believe, the President participated in the meetings and signed the agreements." 😄
"Before entering the presidential office the accountant had received a payroll from the union with the increases of the new parity" ...
"And complained: President, this is all very well with the price agreement we are signing but next month ...
"We have to pay these wage increases." The businessman did not know where to go ...
But Nestor looked at him, put his hand on his back and said, "You do not make drama."

Wage Compensation: When there have been indications that there could be an error in payment, administrative procedures have been opened.
Today we announce that the Vice Minister @ agza05 will return all the money received as a prohibition.
The Vice Minister Zúñiga Aponte has already reimbursed ₡ 7,980,360, last Friday, May 5.
Faced with situations where the payments for prohibition could be inappropriate, we have acted in a forceful way.
When there have been indications that there might be an error, internal administrative procedures have been opened to investigate the cases.
When it has been determined that indeed some payment did not proceed, the persons have returned the money or committed to a payment arrangement.
Salary compensation: We are not facing corruption cases.
When there has been an error, the money has been returned in full or the payment arrangements have been established for the return.
If the money has been returned when an error is verified, there is no prejudice for the Public Treasury or for the taxpayers.
In all the cases that have been identified until today, the administrative procedures have been opened and the money has been refunded.
Yesterday, Deputy Minister Zúñiga Aponte asked the HR Department to initiate negotiations to finalize a payment arrangement (1/2).
(2/2) that allows the refund of the remaining amount amounting to ₡ 19,020,383.
